dmca.title: Defamation complaint from Peter Turtill
dmca.body:
ATT: Legal Via fax.

Your ref: [#36618034]
DEFAMATION COMPLAINT

This item is on google.uk.co and I am in England and I am an English man and I live in England.
The article that defames me is found by typing turtill into google web search and this is the resulting page, http://www.google.co.uk/search?hl=en&q=turrill&btnG=Google+Search&meta=

The article is at
http://uk.forumsforyou.com/p/uk.people.disability/THE_OFFICIAL_PETER_TURTILL)FAQ_110.html

It is a defamatory document that has already been removed for several google groups posts.

It defames me by making several untrue and very hurtful statements about me such as saying my wife doesn't have cancer and that I claim to have it. Also that my wife has left me and falsely claims a list of names that I use for posting to Usenet.

My contact details are in the header of this page.

I believe the article is actionable in England and I am making this request to have this article removed in good faith.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate.
 
Yours sincerely, Peter Turtill
